directions: Combine cranberries, brown sugar, lime juice, cilantro, bloody mary mix, shallot, and garlic in a food processor; pulse until mixture has the consistency of salsa.
Pour sauce into a bowl, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate 8 hours to overnight.
ingredients: 1 1/2 tablespoons bloody mary mix (such as Bloody Amazing Island Seasoning)
title: Amazing Cranberry Sauce
